name: Yaobin Shen
content: Yaobin's HomepageSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationYaobin ShenMy research interest is in cryptography. I'm working on theory and practice of symmetric-key cryptography. I am an associate professor at Xiamen University. Email: yaobins180{AT}gmail.comOpen position: I may have some open position for postdoc. Send me an email if you are interested in working with me. Education & Experience2023-now         Associate professor at Xiamen University2021-2023 Postdoc at UCL Crypto Group 2016-2021 Ph.D. at
